column2:
"You are tough...Normally one would be
shivering in fear just hearing about
defeating 70 in super hard mode, right?"

"Even if he is not afraid, he should still
need to spend some thoughts in it."

"Despite that, you accepted it without
any hesitation."

"Comparatively, I'm convinced that there
might be some meaning in the order to
make some changes in my training..."

"おたくは本当にタフだよなぁ……
スーパーハードで７０体と聞きゃ
ビビるだろ普通？"
"ビビらないにしても少し考え込むとか。"

"それなのに迷いもなくスパッと
引き受けてくれるんだもんな。"

"比較されるオレが修行し直しを
命令されるのも
ある意味、納得だぜ……"
